## Problem 1 -- data

#### Issue 1: incorrect column names  
```{r}
raw_data_weight <- read_excel("./data/dogweights_07may2022.xlsx",range = "B1:F363") 

weight = raw_data_weight      # preserve the raw data for later comparison

colnames(weight) = weight[1,] # change column names

weight <- weight[-1,]         # omit the first row which is the column name


weight

```

#### Issue 2: separate weight observations in 2 units for the 3 dogs 

```{r}
weight <- weight %>% 
  separate(Raisin, c("Raisin (Lbs)","Raisin (Oz)"), sep = " ", convert = TRUE) %>%

  separate(Gagne, c("Gagne (Lbs)","Gagne (Oz)"), sep = " ", convert = TRUE) %>%
```
